India vs New Zealand - Full T20I Schedule

NEW DELHI: India are set to host New Zealand for a high-profile eight-match limited-overs series beginning on January 11. The tour will feature three One-Day Internationals and five Twenty20 Internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through January 31.The series comes at a crucial juncture, with several senior players returning to the ODI format and the T20 side looking to fine-tune combinations ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, which gets underway on February 7 in India and Sri Lanka.The ODI leg of the series is expected to draw significant attention, particularly with stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma making their anticipated return to the 50-over format after the South Africa series.Meanwhile, the T20Is will act as a final testing phase for Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian side as they prepare for their T20 World Cup title defence.While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.The BCCI selection committee is likely to hold an online meeting around January 3 or 4 to finalise the ODI squad for the home series against New Zealand.New Zealand have already announced their T20I and ODI squads for India series.Michael Bracewell (C), Adi Ashok, Kristian Clarke, Josh Clarkson, Devon Conway, Zak Foulkes, Mitch Hay, Kyle Jamieson, Nick Kelly, Jayden Lennox, Daryl Mitchell, Henry Nicholls, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rae, Will Young: Suryakumar Yadav (C), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Rinku Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan Kishan: Mitchell Santner (C), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy, Zak Foulkes, Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, Bevon Jacobs, Daryl Mitchell, James Neesham, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Tim Robinson, Ish Sodhi
Article Summary: India set to host new zealand for a high-profile limited-overs series beginning on january 11. The tour will feature three one-day internationals and five twenty20 internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through january 31.

Article Title: ‚ÄúShe feels exposed‚Äù: Taylor Swift reportedly shaken and uncomfortable by Travis Kelce‚Äôs controversial confession ahead of their wedding
Article Text:
Taylor Swift is reportedly terriefied because of Travis Kelce.(Image via Backgrid)

Taylor Swift is reportedly scared of Travis Kelce's controversial past, ahead of their wedding

Taylor Swift‚Äôs boyfriend, Travis Kelce, is speculated to be retiring this season





Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have had a pretty hard time this season as the Kansas City Chiefs have recorded a pretty average performance on the field this time.With the season coming to an end now, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce seem to be focused on their wedding. But there is something that is reportedly bothering the billionaire pop star.A few weeks ago, Travis Kelce had confessed on his popular podcast, New Heights, about the time he was suspended when he was caught with marijuana in college.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.It seems Taylor Swift is really bothered by this confession. As per Radar Online, a source has revealed that, "Taylor hates that this has become a talking point again. She's spent years crafting a clean, family-friendly image, and she's terrified that something from Travis's past could smear that."A second source added, "She's incredibly proud of how hard he's worked to turn his life around ‚Äì but this story coming back up makes her feel exposed.‚ÄùThe source continued, ‚ÄúTaylor's brand thrives on control and positivity, and this just isn't part of that narrative."However, neither Taylor Swift nor Travis Kelce has responded to these speculations as they continue to be tight lipped about their wedding.Travis Kelce has confessed that he had to go to a therapist after the marijuana incident in college.The popular tight end said, "I had to sit down with a shrink for an hour a week‚Ä¶‚ÄùTravis Kelce added, "He got me to look at my life way more strategically. He got me to understand that you go through these emotions, and your reaction can either help you or hurt you or be indifferent."Despite the obstacles that Travis Kelce faced in his life, he has proven his worth on the field and is easily one of the highest paid players in the league.However, this season was a bit difficult for Travis Kelce as he got brutally trolled for his performance on the field, while Taylor Swift also looked upset.Travis Kelce is also speculated to opt for retirement at the end of this season but nothing has been confirmed yet as he is all set to take a decision in March.Also Read: Taylor Swift reportedly focused on "protecting" her relationship with Travis Kelce as she stepped back from spotlight during the season

Article Title: Andrew McCutchen and Maria Hanslovan combined net worth: Breakdown of MLB earning, contracts, endorsements, and other assets
Article Text:
Andrew McCutchen and Maria Hanslovan (Image Source: Getty)

Andrew McCutchen‚Äôs financial details: Contracts and endorsements

Andrew McCutchen, Maria Hanslovan at 2013 American Music ...

Maria Hanslovan‚Äôs fitness career, joint assets, and net worth of the duo





The brilliant career in Major League Baseball was the main factor that created the foundation of Andrew McCutchen‚Äôs finances. In 2005, the Pittsburgh Pirates called him up without delay, he threw at the peak of his superstar career, and later, he was awarded five All-Star titles and the National League MVP in 2013. Maria Hanslovan, McCutchen's wife, has set up her own fitness and wellness career which has been a steady income source for the couple and thus, has improved their financial stability.Through 16 seasons in the majors, McCutchen's total money earned from the MLB contracts was about $131.4 million. The highest salary he got was in 2012 when he agreed to a six-year, $51.5 million contract extension with the Pirates, thus making the player the franchise‚Äôs mainstay.Later transfers to the San Francisco Giants, Philadelphia Phillies, and Milwaukee Brewers accounted for even more millions, while his signing of a one-year $5 million contract renewal with the Pirates in 2025 is a testament to both his status as a veteran and his continuing worth to the team. Salaries, however, were not the only way, as he was also coming into the picture through endorsement deals by the likes of Nike and Marucci Sports, whose reputation he was in part making as a respected leader and role model.His public persona of being involved in philanthropy and community outreach, among other things, has made him more marketable and has thus provided him with the needed steady income streams even if he stops playing already.Formal fitness certifications play a minor role in Maria's career; the major part is the inspiration drawn from her personal story. Maria has made herself a confidante in the health and wellness area by sharing her training, eating habits, and playful family life. Her power is not restricted to the fitness world. She represents a person who supports McCutchen's cause and, at the same time, flourishes on her own.Collectively, Andrew McCutchen and Maria Hanslovan have $60-$65 million. Their wealth keeps rising from professional careers and joint assets alongside brand deals. The couple's net worth is expected to grow in the coming years.Also Read: Will Andrew McCutchen play against Washington Nationals tonight? Latest update on Pittsburgh Pirates star's injury report (April 14, 2025)
Article Summary: Andrew mccutchen and maria hanslovan have $60-$65 million. Their wealth keeps rising from professional careers and joint assets alongside brand deals. The couple's net worth is expected to grow in the coming years. The pittsburgh pirates star was awarded five all-star titles and the national league mvp in 2013.

Article Title: Full list of NFL head coaches fired on Black Monday 2026
Article Text:
Image - x

Kevin Stefanski ‚Äî Cleveland Browns

Pete Carroll ‚Äî Las Vegas Raiders

Jonathan Gannon ‚Äî Arizona Cardinals

Raheem Morris ‚Äî Atlanta Falcons





The NFL‚Äôs annual Black Monday shakeup is officially underway. Just hours after the regular season wrapped up, teams across the league began making major coaching decisions, signaling resets, rebuilds, and a long offseason of change ahead.With franchises eager to get a head start on the coaching carousel, several head coaches have already been dismissed with more moves potentially coming as ownership groups evaluate disappointing seasons. Here are the list of all coaches that got fired today:The Cleveland Browns fired head coach Kevin Stefanski after six seasons with the organization, ending a tenure that included both highs and prolonged frustration.Despite winning NFL Coach of the Year twice, Stefanski was dismissed following a 5‚Äì12 campaign and what team leadership viewed as a lack of sustained progress. Injuries, quarterback instability, and inconsistent results ultimately led the Browns to decide it was time for a new voice.The Las Vegas Raiders fired Pete Carroll after just one season at the helm, marking one of the most abrupt coaching exits of Black Monday.Carroll signed a three-year deal last year, but the experiment unraveled quickly. The Raiders finished 3‚Äì14, tied for the worst record in the NFL, prompting ownership to opt for a complete reset.With major questions remaining at quarterback and across the roster, Las Vegas will once again search for a head coach capable of leading a rebuild.The Arizona Cardinals parted ways with head coach Jonathan Gannon after three seasons, following another difficult year for the franchise.Arizona closed the 2025 season with a 3‚Äì14 record, extending a stretch of losing seasons and limited progress. Despite efforts to reshape the roster, results never materialized, leading the Cardinals to move in a different direction.The organization now turns its attention to finding a coach who can accelerate development and restore competitiveness.The Atlanta Falcons fired head coach Raheem Morris after back-to-back 8‚Äì9 seasons, missing the playoffs in both years.While Atlanta showed flashes of promise, the inability to break through in a competitive NFC ultimately led to Morris‚Äô dismissal. Team leadership reportedly felt the roster was ready to compete at a higher level and required a new approach to reach that goal.Atlanta now joins the growing list of teams entering the coaching carousel.With multiple openings now available, the NFL coaching carousel is officially in motion. Teams will begin requesting interviews with coordinators on playoff staffs, evaluating former head coaches, and exploring college options as they look to make the right hire.More changes could still come in the days ahead as teams continue postseason evaluations.Also read - Fans accuse Cardi B of crossing a line after now-deleted tweet amid Stefon Diggs allegations
Article Summary: The cleveland browns fired head coach kevin stefanski after six seasons. The las vegas raiders fired pete carroll after just one season at the helm. The arizona cardinals parted ways with head coach jonathan gannon after three seasons. Raheem morris was fired by the atlanta falcons after back-to-back 8‚Äì9 seasons.

Article Title: Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer combined net worth in 2025: A closer look inside 'Mad Max' $180 million empire
Article Text:
Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer (Image Source: Getty)

How Max Scherzer turned dominance into a million-dollar lifestyle

Erica May-Scherzer‚Äôs impact off the field





Max Martin Scherzer, the star baseball player, has made a career out of intensity, toughness, and an indomitable spirit to compete. The American professional Major League Baseball player is also known as ‚ÄòMad Max‚Äô, a pitcher who goes after hitters. That same determination is still noted in 2025, and this defines not only his presence on the pitch but also his financial position.As of 2025, Max Scherzer and his wife, Erica May-Scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million, making them one of the most financially secure couples in Major League Baseball.With an eight-time MLC All-Star title and three Cy Young Awards under his belt, Scherzer has consistently given elite performances into high value contracts. He started his career with the Arizona Diamondbacks and then topped it with the Detroit Tigers, Washington Nationals, and New York Mets, which are some of the most popular teams of the era.The right-handed player who is currently a free agent, mindfully entered contracts that were more focused on longevity and control. High average annual salaries, player opt-outs, and deferred payments allowed Scherzer to protect his future earnings.In 2025, he still gets money as a result of the past transactions which makes him stronger in terms of income even in the off-season. Such impactful decisions soared his career earnings to the highest point in the history of Major League Baseball.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Scherzer did not pursue the limelight beyond the baseball game. Rather, he collaborated and worked with selective equipment and performance-oriented brands. These endorsements contribute to his wealth, but at the same time, they maintain his game-oriented image in the eyes of the public. He also invested carefully, instead of gambling on high-profile projects, Scherzer was interested in stability and long-term growth. Such a disciplined manner is a reflection of how he prepares for every start.Max‚Äôs wife, Erica May-Scherzer, is a former softball player who has experience at the collegiate administrative level, giving her an understanding of professional sports. Owing to her professional player background, Erica has been a great contributor to the success of Scherzer in his career and has helped the couple on and off the field. Although public sources do not track her personal holdings, she is the core of the family philanthropy activities. Together, the Scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.The combined success of Max and Erica May-Scherzer is a result of consistency, crucial planning, and focused sustainability. Moreover, the couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. This strategy has made their long career in baseball a permanent financial standard as well. Having a net worth of approximately $180 million, Scherzers can be viewed as a successful case study of how financial discipline, elite performance, and long-term thinking can build an empire that will endure long after the final pitch.Also Read: Austin Riley and Anna Morgan‚Äôs combined net worth in 2025: Career earnings, salary, family life and more
Article Summary: As of 2025, max scherzer and his wife, erica may-scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million. They're not used to fighting yet, and that could be their first big test."As per Radar Online, a source said, "They are basically sickeningly perfect now, but that could end if they can't deal with inevitable arguments that will come up, which is something they haven't really experienced yet in their honeymoon phase."However, neither Taylor Swift nor Travis Kelce has responded to these speculations yet.For the unversed, a few weeks ago, Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce hosted George Clooney on their podcast, New Heights.As George Clooney reflected on his marriage and relationships, Travis Kelce said, ‚ÄúWell, it‚Äôs only been two and a half years, and you‚Äôre right‚Ä¶I haven‚Äôt gotten into an argument. Article Title: Matt Kuchar‚Äôs net worth in 2025: How consistency turned a PGA Tour grinder into a multimillionaire
Article Text:
Matt Kuchar‚Äôs net worth in 2025: How consistency turned a PGA Tour grinder into a multimillionaire (Image Via Getty Images)

Matt Kuchar's net worth in 2025

Matt Kuchar's career highlights and earnings

Matt Kuchar's world ranking and recent updates

Matt Kuchar's endorsements, home, and charity work

Also Read:





Matt Kuchar is a well-known American golfer who has been playing on the PGA Tour for over 20 years. He is recognized for his tranquil personality, consistent game, and long ascension in the elite category. Kuchar has been making millions from prize money and sponsor deals throughout his career; thus, he is regarded as one of the most prosperous golfers of his era.The estimated net worth of Matt Kuchar as of March 2025 is $25 million. His winnings on the PGA Tour, along with the bonuses he received from the major tournaments and the long-term sponsorship contracts, are the factors that contributed to most of his fortune. Kuchar has been a consistent performer for many years, which has helped him earn a steady income even without frequent wins late in his career.Matt Kuchar was born on June 21, 1978, and turned professional in 2000. He won his first PGA Tour event at the Honda Classic in 2002. His best financial year came in 2010, when he topped the PGA Tour money list and won both the Vardon Trophy and the Byron Nelson Award.As of March 2025, Kuchar has won nine PGA Tour titles. His biggest wins include The Players Championship in 2012 and the WGC Match Play in 2013.Spotrac estimates that he has made around $67 million in total throughout his career, of which the largest payouts from a single event were The Players Championship ($1.7 million) and the WGC Match Play ($1.5 million).According to the Official World Golf Ranking (OWGR), Matt Kuchar was ranked No. 133 in March 2025. His career-best ranking was No. 4 in 2013. He also won a bronze medal at the 2016 Olympic Games while representing the United States.In recent seasons, Kuchar has played a limited schedule. There have been no major wins or injuries reported in 2025, and he continues to compete mainly as a veteran presence on tour.Kuchar has endorsement deals with Bridgestone Golf and Bettinardi Golf, confirmed through the brands‚Äô official websites. He lives in St. Simons Island, Georgia, where he owns a large home purchased in 2010.He is also known for charity work. In 2015, he donated $25,000 to United Way after missing a charity shot at an NBA game. In 2020, he donated $52,000 to help PGA Tour caddies during the COVID-19 pandemic, using his Players Championship earnings. Matt Kuchar‚Äôs career reflects steady success, smart earnings, and lasting respect on the PGA Tour.
Article Summary: Matt kuchar was born on june 21, 1978, and turned professional in 2000. He won his first pga tour event at the honda classic in 2002. His biggest wins include the players championship in 2012 and the wgc match play in 2013. He has endorsement deals with bridgestone golf and bettinardi golf.

Article Title: Arizona Cardinals fire head coach Jonathan Gannon after three seasons, ending 15-36 tenure
Article Text:
Cardinals fire Jonathan Gannon after three seasons of struggles (Image via: Getty Images)

Why Jonathan Gannon was let go: Inside the Arizona Cardinals‚Äô coaching change







The Arizona Cardinals have decided to part ways with head coach Jonathan Gannon after three seasons, signaling a major shift for the struggling franchise. Gannon took on his first NFL head coaching job with the Cardinals after a successful run as the Eagles‚Äô defensive coordinator. He was supposed to develop great chemistry with quarterback Kyler Murray , but results fell short, with the Cardinals finishing the 2025 season at a disappointing 3-14. Arizona ‚Äôs management decided it was time for a fresh start. Although there was some improvement in 2024, Gannon‚Äôs three-year tenure left the Cardinals dead last in the NFC West and near the bottom of league rankings. Injuries, roster challenges, and coaching decisions have contributed to the team struggling over the course of their games.Gannon finishes his Arizona tenure with a combined 15-36 record, never reaching the playoffs. The first season in 2023 saw the end of the campaign with a 4-13 record. The following season in 2024 experienced a slight improvement with a close 8-9 season. However, the following season in 2025 experienced a season with three wins and a sharp decline that observed them losing their last nine matches consecutively after beginning with a season-opening win of 2-0.Gannon joined Arizona on February 14, 2023, in a move that came with controversy.The team was penalized for tampering during the hiring process, resulting in a swap of third-round draft picks with the Eagles and the loss of a 2024 fifth-round pick. Nevertheless, there were lofty hopes considering his success on defense for Philadelphia as well as his potential as a young coach.At 43, Gannon is still relatively young for the coaching ranks in the NFL. While his experience as a head coach was not that successful for the Cardinals, his experience as a defense specialist coach gives them a great reason to consider his services as a coordinator and also possibly bring him back as a head coach.The Cardinals are left with the task of hiring a coach to rebuild the roster, improve the consistency of the team‚Äôs play, and establish a long-term vision. The Cardinals‚Äô hiring decision reflects the quick pace of the NFL, where teams must deliver results without delay. When the new NFL season rolls around in the year 2026, the Cardinals will begin the process of searching for the coach to convert promise to success.
Article Summary: Cardinals fire jonathan gannon after three seasons of struggles. Gannon finishes his arizona tenure with a combined 15-36 record, never reaching the playoffs. Cardinals are left with the task of hiring a coach to rebuild the roster, improve the consistency of the team's play, and establish a long-term vision.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHe owned a part of it‚Äù - Rich Paul goes candid on why Michael Jordan‚Äôs business game still outshines every NBA star
Article Text:
Former NBA legend Michael Jordan (Image via: Getty Images)



From Bulls colors to college blue how Michael Jordan made sneakers carry legacy?



How Air Jordans became Michael Jordan‚Äôs timeless empire?







NBA legend Michael Jordan is often praised for what he did on the basketball court, but his impact goes far beyond championships and iconic on-court moments. Long after his retirement from the big league, Jordan built a business empire that is still looked upon by athletes across all sports. His success was not accidental, rather, it was the result of smart decisions Jordan made early in his career.NBA superstars today earn massive amounts of money through brand endorsements, but Michael Jordan changed the game by thinking like an owner, not just as the face for a brand. According to Rich Paul, founder of Klutch Sports and an agent to LeBron James, Jordan understood something many athletes didn‚Äôt at the time, that is, real power comes from royalties and long-term ownership.Speaking on the podcast, Game Over with Max Kellerman and Rich Paul, Paul explained why Michael Jordan‚Äôs approach stood apart from everyone else. While most players signed deals, Jordan focused on building something that would last beyond his playing career. He didn‚Äôt just promote products, he helped create them. Paul said in the interview about Michael Jordan that, ‚ÄúHe built the business and he owned a part of it‚Äù.That mindset allowed Jordan to earn huge amounts of money, even decades later. According to Paul, the Air Jordan brand, owned by Michael Jordan, didn‚Äôt depend on him playing basketball, it stood on its own.Another key part of Michael Jordan‚Äôs financial success was his impressive storytelling. His shoes weren‚Äôt just sneakers, they carried meaning with them. The classic red, black, and white colors reflected the Chicago Bulls. Later, the Carolina blue paid tribute to his college days. Fans didn‚Äôt just buy shoes, they bought into a story that connected them with Jordan.Many active NBA stars have strong sneaker deals. Players like LeBron James, Kevin Durant, Stephen Curry, and Luka Doncic each earn millions through partnerships with some of the world's major brands. But Rich Paul made it clear that Jordan‚Äôs model, till today, stands above the rest.Michael Jordan didn‚Äôt rely on signing constant new deals. Rather, his brand became a business that could refresh itself by releasing new designs every now and then. So even after releasing 40 signature shoes, Air Jordans still sell out and dominate the sneaker culture worldwide. And that long-term vision is what separates Jordan from everyone else. He didn‚Äôt chase quick money. He built something that he knew could grow and survive without having the need for him to be in the spotlight every day.Also Read: Magic Johnson vs Michael Jordan net worth comparison: Exploring NBA veterans' career earnings, off-court ventures and more
Article Summary: Nba legend michael jordan is often praised for what he did on the basketball court, but his impact goes far beyond championships and iconic on-court moments. Long after his retirement from the big league, jordan built a business empire that is still looked upon by athletes across all sports.

Article Title: Kevin Stefanski fired: Browns‚Äô ongoing quarterback chaos leads to coaching change after 5-12 season
Article Text:
Browns part ways with Kevin Stefanski amid quarterback struggles (Image via: Getty Images)

The Browns‚Äô quarterback dilemma left Kevin Stefanski with few solutions







The Cleveland Browns‚Äô decision to move on from Kevin Stefanski marks the end of a tenure shaped as much by promise as by persistent instability at quarterback. Since Baker Mayfield left after the 2021 season, the Browns have struggled to find a consistent quarterback, a challenge that marked the final years of Stefanski‚Äôs tenure.The breaking point came after a 5-12 finish in the 2025 NFL season, one of the worst records in the league. On Monday, the Browns confirmed Stefanski‚Äôs firing, thanking him for his work while making it clear that general manager Andrew Berry will remain in place to oversee the next phase of the rebuild.From the outset, last year felt like a transition year. The Browns expected their defense to keep them competitive, but the offense entered training camp without clarity under center. Cleveland carried four quarterbacks: veteran Joe Flacco, former Steelers first-rounder Kenny Pickett, and rookies Dillon Gabriel and Shedeur Sanders. Pickett was moved before the season, leaving Flacco as the Week 1 starter by default.Flacco struggled in four starts, throwing six interceptions against two touchdowns before being traded to the Cincinnati Bengals, where he revived his season. With Flacco gone, the Browns turned to Gabriel, whose play showed effort but little consistency.Stefanski‚Äôs reluctance to hand the offense to Sanders, despite the rookie‚Äôs draft-day slide and high profile, became a talking point as losses piled up.A concussion to Gabriel finally opened the door for Sanders. He flashed potential, most notably with a three-touchdown performance against the Titans, but wins never followed. With the season effectively lost, the organization decided a coaching change was necessary.Stefanski‚Äôs dismissal cannot be separated from the long shadow of the Deshaun Watson trade. Deshaun Watson‚Äôs $230 million fully guaranteed contract, combined with inconsistent play, left the Browns with few reliable options. Many seasons have passed, during which the Browns have had multiple backup QBs, which has made it tough for Stefanski on the offense.Despite these challenges, Stefanski guided the Browns to two playoff appearances, including an impressive 11-5 debut season and a surprise 2023 run boosted by Flacco‚Äôs late-season resurgence. His .440 winning percentage is certainly the best in the past several decades as a coach of the Cleveland Browns.As the Browns search for their next head coach, the franchise faces familiar questions. Cleveland must decide whether Gabriel or Sanders can become a long-term solution, and whether the next coach can finally bring stability where it has been missing for far too long.Also Read: Cam Newton claims "Kevin Stefanski doesn't want Shedeur Sanders to succeed" as his rough NFL debut sparks heated debate within Cleveland Browns
Article Summary: Cleveland browns part ways with head coach kevin stefanski. Browns have struggled to find a consistent quarterback since baker mayfield left. Stefanski guided the browns to two playoff appearances, including an impressive 11-5 debut season and a surprise 2023 run boosted by joe flacco‚Äôs resurgence.

Article Title: LeBron James breaks yet another historic record in Lakers‚Äô win over Grizzlies
Article Text:
Los Angeles Lakers forward LeBron James (23) gestures during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Memphis Grizzlies Sunday, Jan. 4, 2026, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Ethan Swope)

LeBron James is the ultimate dual-threat



LeBron James‚Äô 50,000-point longevity







Every Lakers' game with LeBron James feels like a brush with history, but Sunday night against Memphis Grizzlies, the air in the Crypto.com Arena just felt different. The 41-year-old hasn‚Äôt just been defying the stereotypes but also put up a veteran performance that took over the record books. In the second half with a clinical pass, LeBron James officially moved into 2nd place all-time in total assists (combining regular season and playoffs), passing Chris Paul.Combined with his existing throne as the NBA ‚Äôs all-time leading scorer, LeBron is now the first and only player in the history of the sport to be 1st in points and 2nd in assists. For those who have followed him since the Chosen One cover in 2002, this isn't just a stat, it's a reflection of greatness unfolding in real time.LeBron James is not filling space on the court. From rebounding, scoring, and assisting his teammates on the court to cheering from the courtside, James makes sure he‚Äôs there through and through. Scoring points requires a single focus on the rim, but assisting requires the opposite: an unselfish and eagle-eyed vision to know who‚Äôs where.During the Lakers' 120‚Äì114 victory, LeBron ran back and forth on the hardwood for 37 minutes and scored 26 points and 10 assists along with 7 rebounds, 2 three-pointers, and 6 field goals.With 10 assists, he brought his career total to 13,793 assists, Chris Paul. The only target who‚Äôs left on the list is now the legendary John Stockton at #1.This is LeBron‚Äôs 23rd NBA season, the first player to record such a long career on the rectangle, yet he doesn‚Äôt seem to be stopping. Guiding a roster filled with superstars like Luka Doncic and Austin Reeves, James is doing much more than player responsibilities.LeBron James officially surpassed the 50,000 total career points mark (regular season plus playoffs) in March 2025. He told Spectrum SportsNet in the on-court interview, "It's a hell of a lot of points, and I'm super blessed to be able to put that many points up in the best league in the world with the best players in the world over my career. It's pretty special."Every accolade and achievement makes sense when the King continues to show why he is the 21-time All-Star. For Lakers fans, each match brings another thrill while witnessing LeBron James rewrite the very definition of basketball greatness.Also read: How one jump turned Michael Jordan into a cultural phenomenon and built a billion-dollar legacy
Article Summary: Lebron james scored 26 points and 10 assists during the lakers' 120‚Äì114 victory against memphis grizzlies. He moved into 2nd place all-time in total assists (combining regular season and playoffs), passing chris paul. Lebron is now the first and only player in the history of the sport to be 1st in points and 2nd in assists.

Article Title: Anthony Joshua‚Äôs first public statement after the fatal Nigerian car crash shares a final tribute via Instagram
Article Text:
Anthony Joshua‚Äôs first public statement after the fatal Nigerian car crash shares a final tribute via Instagram.

Anthony Joshua Breaks Silence After CRASH Kills Two Friends And Leaves Career In Doubt | WATCH





Famous boxer Anthony Joshua has spoken about the tragic car accident in Nigeria that killed two of his friends and sent him to the hospital. Joshua shared two photos on Instagram on Sunday, January 4, with the caption as a tribute to two of his close friends, Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele, who died in the tragedy.‚ÄúMy Brother‚Äôs Keeper ‚ù§Ô∏èü™ñ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ÄùAnthony Joshua, 36, was driving on the Lagos‚ÄìAbeokuta Expressway in Nigeria, the country‚Äôs busiest highway. A collision happened on Monday, 29 December, killing two of his friends and leaving him hospitalized.Joshua had some minor injuries, but local police told the BBC that he was "fine" at the time of the event.Several photos are shared online; it seems to show Joshua being taken out of a car, shirtless. According to the eyewitness statement, the Nigerian outlet states that Joshua was ‚Äúseated behind the driver‚Äù at the time of the collision, and there was ‚Äúanother person beside him‚Äù in the vehicle.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Matchroom Boxing said in a statement, ‚ÄúWith profound sadness, it has been confirmed that two close friends and team members, Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele, have tragically passed away.‚ÄùAnthony Joshua was hospitalized after the accident. ‚ÄúHe is in stable condition and will remain there for observation.‚Äù In addition to the statement, ‚ÄúOur deepest condolences and prayers are with the families and friends of all those affected, and we ask that their privacy be respected at this incredibly difficult time. No further comment will be made at this time.‚ÄùWho were Sina Ghami and Latif Ayodele to Anthony Joshua?Anthony Joshua and Sina Ghami, who founded Evolve Gym, collaborated closely on strength and conditioning. His final social media post was shared last month, featuring him working on Joshua's body before the professional athlete's boxing battle against Jake Paul on December 19. Latif Ayodele served as Joshua's personal trainer and maintained a close friendship with him. In Joshua‚Äôs last post before the collision, two of them were shown playing table tennis.Anthony Joshua is a former two-time heavyweight champion, most recently defeated Jake Paul, 29, in their eagerly awaited bout, which was broadcast on Netflix from the Kaseya Center in Miami. Joshua started boxing when he was just 18, and he won a gold medal at the 2012 London Olympic Games representing Great Britain.‚ÄúIt wasn‚Äôt the best performance. It wasn‚Äôt the best,‚Äù Joshua claims that ‚ÄúThe end goal was ‚Äòpin Jake Paul down and hurt him.‚Äù Joshua‚Äôs interview earlier this month with daily mail sports, ‚ÄúMy mind is filled with a different kind of pain. Just the stuff I want to do to my opponents. I want to compete. I want to fight. I want you to hit me. Then, I am going to hit you back 10 times harder,‚Äù‚ÄúI just want to compete, and that‚Äôs where my mind is.‚ÄùAlso read: Anthony Joshua shared a fun table tennis game hours before the deadly car crash.
Article Summary: Anthony joshua, 36, was driving on the lagos‚Äìabeokuta expressway in nigeria. A collision happened on monday, 29 december, killing two of his friends and leaving him hospitalized. Matchroom boxing said in a statement, ‚Äúwith profound sadness, it has been confirmed that two close friends and team members have tragically passed away.‚Äù

Article Title: Giannis Antetokounmpo vs Stephen Curry net worth: Career earnings, contract details, endorsements and more
Article Text:
Photo via Imagn Images

What is Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs net worth? Milwaukee Bucks star‚Äôs career earnings, contract details, endorsements and more

What is Stephen Curry‚Äôs net worth? Golden State Warriors star‚Äôs career earnings, contract details, endorsements and more

Also Read:





Giannis Antetokounmpo and Stephen Curry are two of the biggest competitors within the NBA. Stephen joined the league four years ahead of Giannis. Ever since, both athletes have earned accolades and achievements for themselves. Stephen was selected as the 7th overall pick by the Golden State Warriors in 2009 and Giannis was selected as the 15th overall pick by the Milwaukee Bucks in 2013.A common factor besides being two of the greatest competitors of all time is that the duo have stuck with their initial teams since the time they were drafted. Even though recently there were talks about Giannis being traded, the Bucks are highly unlikely to do that. While the athletes continue to leave a mark within the league, let‚Äôs take a look at their net worths, contract details, endorsements and everything you need to know about them.Giannis Antetokounmpo is one of the highest-paid athletes in the league. He earned a spot in the top 10 NBA players‚Äô salaries for the 2025-2026 season. Giannis‚Äô exact salary for the season is $54,126,450. His net worth currently stands at $94.4 million.This is as per the latest update by Celebrity Net Worth. The Milwaukee Bucks star signed some of the most notable deals with the team. He signed a four-year $100 million deal with the team in 2016. Four years later, the athlete signed a five-year $228 million contract. In October 2023, he signed a three-year $186 million extension with the Bucks. To date, the athlete has earned a total amount of $338,006,542.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Apart from his on-court earnings, a huge part of his income comes from the off-court ventures and endorsements. The athlete has a lifetime deal with Nike, launching his signature shoe line, Zoom Freak. Giannis is also associated with brands like Breitling, Unilever, Google, PepsiCo and Castrol. He earns $45 million annually from the endorsements.Giannis has also invested in businesses. The athlete launched a drink brand with his brothers and invested in health and fitness startups. He also owns a part of the Nashville SC. It is a Major League Soccer team.Stephen Curry stays on top in terms of being the highest-paid athlete within the NBA. The Golden State Warriors star earned a fortune with his dunk skills and popularity, both from his on-court and off-court ventures. As per Celebrity Net Worth‚Äôs latest update, his net worth stands at $240 million. In 2017, Stephen signed the most lucrative deal with the Warriors at that point in time. He signed a 5-year, $201.2 million contract with the team. The deal made him the first player to earn more than $40 million per season. In 2022, the player signed a 4-year, $215 million contract. Stephen signed another contract in 2024. It was a one-year, $62.6 million contract. The contract would pay him a salary of more than $60 million for the 2026-2027 season. This made him the third player, after LeBron James and Kevin Durant, to earn more than $500 million from the court alone.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Apart from the on-court earnings, the athlete has earned from his endorsements as well. Stephen has associated himself with brands like Under Armour, Nike, and TCL's line of "Palm" phones. Typically, the athlete earns around $30-$40 million each year from these endorsements. Stephen has a foundation of his own that he runs with his wife, Ayesha Curry, Eat.Play.Learn. He also launched a bourbon whiskey line in honor of his father. Stephen named the brand ‚ÄúGentleman‚Äôs Cut Bourbon.‚Äù Stephen also joined hands with the PLEZi Nutrition and launched the PLEZi hydration drinks.Based on net worths, Stephen clearly wins the race against Giannis Antetokounmpo. Stephen‚Äôs off-court endorsements and ventures have helped him take the lead in terms of fortune over his contemporaries. Follow this space for more such net worth comparisons, contract details and more.
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo and stephen curry are two of the biggest competitors within the nba. Stephen joined the league four years ahead of giannis. Both athletes have earned accolades and achievements for themselves. Let‚Äôs take a look at their net worths, contract details, endorsements and more.

Article Title: India's Got Talent 11 Winner: Amazing Apsaras lift the trophy; take home a car and a cash prize of Rs 10 lakh; Team says 'This is a dreamlike moment'
Article Text:
Bigg Boss OTT winner: Divya Agarwal lifts the trophy and wins Rs 25 lakh





After two and half months of non-stop entertainment and intense competition, India's Got Talent 11 found its winner in Kolkata‚Äôs all-women dance troupe, Amazing Apsaras. They were declared the winners of the reality show last night and lifted winner's trophy, a car and a cash prize of Rs 10 lakh. While Amazing Apsaras became the winners, Sound of Souls x Gaurash were first runner-up and Hidden Fire Crew emerged as the second runner-up.Throughout the competition, Amazing Apsaras stood out for their amazing storytelling and a mix of classic and modern dance styles. The dance group was always in the news for their perfectly timed moves and expressive choreography. Viewers loved their dance style and often discussed them on social media.The official Instagram page of the channel shared a video of the dance group from the finale night. In the clip, all the members of the group are seen expressing their happiness on lifting the trophy.The team thanked everyone for their support and shared, "We are feeling really good right now because all this hard work has finally paid off. This is a dreamlike moment. The journey has been amazing. Thank you so much for supporting us.And this trophy is for you."India‚Äôs Got Talent returned with its eleventh season in October 2025. This time the show was judged by a fresh panel of judges. Navjot Singh Sidhu , singer Shaan , and Malaika Arora judged the acts throughout the season. Harrsh Limbachiyaa took on the hosting duties.The grand finale saw spectacular performances and was graced by popular Bollywood stars. From Karisma Kapoor, Emran Hashmi, Sharad Kelkar, to Zoya Afroz, several actors made an appearance on the show. Judges from MasterChef India ‚ÄîVikas Khanna, Ranveer Brar, and Kunal Kapoor.
Article Summary: Kolkata's all-women dance troupe, amazing apsaras, were declared the winners. Sound of souls x gaurash were first runner-up and hidden fire crew emerged as the second runner-ups. The grand finale saw spectacular performances and was graced by popular bollywood stars.

Article Title: Mustafizur Rahman row spills over: What 'saddened, hurt, and aggrieved' Bangladesh said while banning IPL broadcast
Article Text:
An IPL match between Chennai Super Kings (CSK) and Lucknow Super Giants. (File photo)

Bangladesh seek T20 WC match shift from India after Mustafizur Rahman's IPL exit

What Bangladesh government said







Bangladesh on Monday banned the broadcast of the upcoming Indian Premier League (IPL) season, citing the removal of pacer Mustafizur Rahman from the tournament. The decision followed instructions from the Board of Control for Cricket in India ( BCCI ) to IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders to release the Bangladesh fast bowler from their 2026 squad.The IPL season is scheduled to begin on March 26.The ban came a day after Bangladesh decided not to travel to India for next month‚Äôs T20 World Cup and asked the International Cricket Council (ICC) to move all of its group matches to Sri Lanka, the tournament‚Äôs co-host."It has come to attention that Mustafizur Rahman, a star player from Bangladesh, has been instructed to be dropped from the Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) team for the Indian Premier League (IPL) cricket matches," the Bangladesh government said in an official statement."No logical reason for such a decision (Rahman's release) by the BCCI is known, and such a decision has saddened, hurt, and aggrieved the people of Bangladesh," the notification said."In this situation, until further notice, it is requested by order to stop the broadcasting/telecasting of all matches and programs of the Indian Premier League (IPL). This order is issued with the approval of the proper authority and in the public interest," the release added.Earlier, BCCI secretary Devajit Saikia said the decision to ask KKR to release Rahman was taken due to "developments all around," without giving further details.Relations between India and Bangladesh have been under strain since the removal of former Bangladesh prime minister Sheikh Hasina, who fled to India in August 2024 after anti-government protests. She was later sentenced to death in absentia by a tribunal over her alleged role in a crackdown during the protests, in which several students were killed. Violence against minorities has been reported since her removal.
Article Summary: Bangladesh ban the broadcast of the upcoming indian premier league (ipl) season. Ban follows the removal of pacer mustafizur rahman from the tournament. Decision followed instructions from the board of control for cricket in india to ipl franchise kolkata knight riders to release rahman.

Article Title: 14-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi smashes South Africa, hits 10 sixes in quickfire fifty
Article Text:
Vaibhav Sooryavanshi (X-Cricbuzz)

Bangladesh seek T20 WC match shift from India after Mustafizur Rahman's IPL exit





NEW DELHI: India were set a target of 246 after South Africa Under-19 were bowled out for 245, but the chase quickly became about one name. Vaibhav Sooryavanshi, leading the side, walked out to open and immediately took control, lighting up the contest with a breathtaking start.The 14-year-old tore into the bowling from the outset, racing to 68 off just 24 balls. His innings was built on clean, fearless hitting, with ten sixes and a four clearing the ropes with ease. Vaibhav brought up his half-century in just 19 deliveries, giving India Under-19 exactly the momentum they were looking for at the top of the order. He shared a 67-run opening stand with Aaron George, who made 20 before falling early in the chase.Earlier in the day, South Africa Under-19 had opted to bat first. Jorich van Schalkwyk and Adnaan Lagadien began the innings, contributing 10 and 25 respectively, but neither was able to convert their start. Captain Muhammed Bulbulia also failed to settle, departing for 14 as wickets fell at regular intervals.The visitors found stability through Jason Rowles, who played the standout innings of the first innings.Rowles scored a composed 114 from 113 balls, anchoring the batting effort when the side needed it most. He received some support from Daniel Bosman, who added 31 off 63 deliveries, but South Africa struggled to build partnerships around them and was eventually dismissed for 245.India‚Äôs bowlers shared the workload effectively, with Kishan Singh leading the attack. He delivered a strong spell of 8.3 overs, picking up four wickets while conceding 46 runs. RS Ambrish chipped in with two wickets, while Deepesh Devendran, Kanishk Chouhan, and Khilan Patel claimed one each to ensure South Africa never fully broke free.Vaibhav‚Äôs explosive innings once again underlined his reputation as one of the most exciting batters at this level. Last year, he set a benchmark by scoring the fastest hundred in Under-19 cricket, reaching the milestone off just 52 balls against England in Worcester.The match, however, was interrupted multiple times due to bad lightning, and India‚Äôs innings was reduced to just 27 overs under the DLS method, while South Africa had batted their full 50 overs. India U19 completed the chase in 23.2 overs, scoring 176 for 2 and winning by 8 wickets. Vedant Trivedi contributed an unbeaten 31 off 57 balls, while Abhigyan Kundu remained not out on 48 from 42 deliveries, guiding India safely home.The ongoing three-match ODI series against South Africa is serving as preparation for the Under-19 World Cup, which begins on January 15 across Zimbabwe and Namibia.
Article Summary: South africa under-19 were bowled out for 245 by india u19. Vaibhav sooryavanshi scored 68 off just 24 balls. India completed the chase in 23.2 overs, scoring 176 for 2 and winning by 8 wickets. Jason rowles scored 114 from 113 balls for south africa.

Article Title: 'Don't think about ‚Ä¶ ': Ricky Ponting sends big message to out-of-form Suryakumar Yadav
Article Text:
India's Suryakumar Yadav(PTI Photo/Shashank Parade)

Bangladesh seek T20 WC match shift from India after Mustafizur Rahman's IPL exit





Former Australia captain Ricky Ponting has expressed his confidence in out-of-form India skipper Suryakumar Yadav ahead of the T20 World Cup, which is set to begin on February 7. Despite a rough run in 2025, where Yadav has scored just 218 runs in 19 innings at a strike rate of 123.16, Ponting urged the Indian batter to trust his natural game and maintain his aggressive approach.‚ÄúThat's as big a surprise for me, just looking at his recent form. He's been such a solid and consistent contributor for India in T20 cricket for a long time and just hasn't been able to find it of late,‚Äù Ponting told ICC. He added, ‚ÄúHe's an interesting one because when I've seen him play his best, he's taken six or eight or 10 balls to get going and then just lets it all go.‚ÄùPonting highlighted Yadav‚Äôs fearless style, comparing him to Australia‚Äôs Travis Head. ‚ÄúHe plays all of his shots and backs himself, and a bit like Travis Head, where it almost looks like they don't ever fear getting out,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThat's what I'd say to him. I'd be saying, think about scoring runs, don't think about getting out. Trust yourself, back yourself. You're proven to be as good as anybody in the world in the T20 format and go and prove it to everybody once again. ‚ÄùThe former Aussie great also praised India‚Äôs decision to appoint 31-year-old Axar Patel as vice-captain for the T20 World Cup. Ponting lauded Patel‚Äôs versatility, noting, ‚ÄúI mean, actually, Patel's been their go-to man, really hasn't he? The last few series, he's been their pinch hitter at different times.They've batted him up the order at number three. When they've needed that left-hand, right-hand combination, he's been the man to go out and try and do it for them, and he's obviously ever consistent with his left-arm off spin as well. ‚ÄùPonting admitted he was surprised by the exclusion of India ODI and Test captain Shubman Gill from the T20 squad. Gill, who has struggled in recent white-ball cricket, has 291 runs in 15 innings with a highest score of 47. ‚ÄúYeah, I couldn't believe that,‚Äù Ponting said during an appearance on The ICC Review with host Sanjana Ganesan. He added, ‚ÄúI know his recent form hasn't been great in white-ball cricket. And the last time that I really saw much of him play was the Test series against England in the UK, where he batted as well as I've ever seen anybody bat. ‚ÄùDespite his surprise, Ponting praised India‚Äôs batting depth, suggesting that leaving Gill out reflects the strength of the squad. ‚ÄúI mean one, I'm surprised, but two, it just shows the depth of Indian cricket,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúIf you can think that someone as good as Shubman Gill doesn't get picked in a World Cup squad, then it goes to show how many good players they do have.‚ÄùPonting‚Äôs comments underline his belief that while individual form can fluctuate, backing one‚Äôs instincts and leveraging team depth remain key in high-pressure tournaments like the T20 World Cup.
Article Summary: Former australia captain ricky ponting has expressed his confidence in out-of-form india skipper suryakumar yadav. Yadav has scored just 218 runs in 19 innings at a strike rate of 123.16. Ponting also praised india‚Äôs decision to appoint 31-year-old axar patel as vice-captain.
